ComicInfo.Summary: Isis, Magda, and Ishtar use their magic to try to track down the source of evil in Montreal as Kevin, Joe, and Wally look on. Wally warns Kevin against the dangers of magic-tinged love, but Kevin and Magda quickly fall for each other. Joe continues Wally's theme of worry, however, as he comments that it seems that Kevin is almost magically enchanted with Magda's charms. Even Kevin is a bit worried. They decide to look around for some nasties. Joe runs into Ishtar, who seduces him. But it turns out that she is really a Leanhaun Sidhe, a succubus, and she takes control of him.
